text: Josephine Davison is a New Zealand actress.Profile on NZ On Screen She is known for playing Gina Rossi-Dodds in the New Zealand soap Shortland Street and as Suzy Hong in drama Outrageous Fortune. She began her career with 3 years in soap opera Shortland Street as cafe owner Gina Rossi (later Gina Rossi-Dodds), a founder member of the show's cast. She also appeared on the New Zealand T.V. series Outrageous Fortune as Triad wife Suzy Hong (Season 1-2). She was in New Zealand film Topless Women Talk About Their Lives. She was the villain Morgana in Power Rangers: S.P.D. and the voice of Itassis in Power Rangers: Mystic Force. She appeared several times in both Hercules: The Legendary Journeys and Xena: Warrior Princess (TV series), each time playing a different role (Ramina, Princess Alexa, Arachne and Amensu in Hercules; Queen Cleopatra and Artemis in Xena). She has also acted on stage in The Only Child in New Zealand, an adaptation of Henrik Ibsen's Little Eyolf. ==References== ==External links== *Josephine Davison at Auckland Actors * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand television actresses Category:New Zealand film actresses Category:New Zealand voice actresses
title: Josephine Davison
